uk.ac.ebi.centres.priority.descriptor

Class DescriptorRule<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.centres.priority.AbstractPriorityRule<A>
      • uk.ac.ebi.centres.priority.descriptor.DescriptorRule<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<Ligand<A>>, PriorityRule<A>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RSRule, ZERule

    public class DescriptorRule<A>
extends AbstractPriorityRule<A>
    A configurable descriptor rule that allows ranking of ligands based on their descriptors. The type of descriptor can be provided by a DescriptorAccessor. The rule type will default to Descriptor.Type#ASYMMETRIC but can also be configured for R>S rules. The ranking is achieved by assigning each descriptor a value 1 .. n. If a given descriptor is not found in the ranking is assign rank 0.
    Author:
    John May

      • DescriptorRule

        public DescriptorRule(DescriptorAccessor<A> accessor,
                      PriorityRule.Type ordering,
                      Descriptor... descriptors)
        Create an Descriptor.Type#ASYMMETRIC rule with a provided accessor and given ligand order. Ligand order preceedes that the higher index number the higher the priority.
        Parameters:
        accessor - a DescriptorAccessor for a descriptor label
        ordering -
        descriptors - ranking of descriptors low .. high priority
